channel.title: Npc problem
channel.description: I added spirit beast, client side, I can spawn it in-game but it's not any where's in my server side. So when I try to add to npc.config I get an error when I start up the server. How can I add the spirit beast server side so I don't get any errors?

item.title: Npc problem
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

I added spirit beast, client side, I can spawn it in-game but it’s not any where’s in my server side. So when I try to add to npc.config I get an error when I start up the server. How can I add the spirit beast server side so I don’t get any errors?
